General.Name: Xinjiang Tecon Animal Husbandry Bio-Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: TECON BIOLOGY Co.LTD, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of animal health care, feed, pig breeding, agricultural product processing and trade, and financial services in China and internationally. The company operates through five divisions: Feed, Pharmaceutical, Food Farming, Protein Oil, and Agricultural Products. The Feed division offers pigs, poultry, dairy cows, ruminants, aquatic feed products, as well as premixes and additives. The Pharmaceutical division researches and develops livestock and poultry disease vaccine products. The Food Farming division operates pig breeding, slaughtering, and segmentation facilities; provides deep processing of meat products; and cold chain distribution and sales. The Protein Oil division processes and produces cotton oil, meals, and shells, as well as linters. The Agricultural Products division engages in the acquisition and sale of agricultural and sideline products; crop drying, warehousing, logistics; agricultural machinery; grain storage equipment processing; import and export of goods and technology; processing, sales, agency business, etc. The company was formerly known as Xinjiang Tecon Animal Husbandry Bio-Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tecon Biology Co.Ltd in June 2016. Tecon Biology Co.Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Urumqi, China.
